goal.ch: 透過介紹遙感探測原理與施測方法了解衛星運動、訊號處理、光譜分類、定位導航、誤差分析，並熟稔各式衛星觀測資料的精度與使用時機，同時具備資料收集、處理、驗證、應用等獨立操作能力。本課程將以地球觀測相關應用為主軸，對於結構監測、地物探勘、地質調查、水文監測、海洋遙測與皆能扮演輔助的角色。
goal.en: The basics about satellite motion, signal processing, spectral classification, positioning and navigation services will be given. Various satellite products and their associated applications will be offered. The students will have the capability to apply satellite data in the fields related to structure monitoring, geophysical exploration, geological investigation, hydrological surveillance, and marine remote sensing.

outline.ch: 遙測基本概念，數位資料處理，衛星系統與酬載，遙測數據分析，影像圖形識別概念，時序變遷分析，地理資訊系統簡介，遙測資料幾何處理，三維資訊萃取，大氣輻射概念，大氣遙測，微波遙測，合成孔徑雷達，雷達簡介及其應用，衛星測量及導航，全球定位系統簡介，遙測綜合定位，衛星氣象。
outline.en: Remote Sensing basics, digital data processing, satellite systems and payloads, image processing and pattern recognition, time series analysis, geographic information system, 3D information extraction, atmospheric radiative transfer model, microwave and synthetic aperture radar, global satellite navigation systems, satellite meteorology.
